Name: Mora Inn
Description: Great Hotel right in the heart of Times Square. Explore everything The Big Apple has to offer. Many restaurants and places to go and enjoy

Name: Hilton Hotel
Description: One of Hilton's finest hotels in Downtown Los Angeles. Very close to all major downtown attractions.

Name: Plaza Hotel
Description: Plaza Hotel in Chicago is one of the most iconic hotels in America. Lots of history behind this hotel and the area.

Name: Holiday Inn
Description: Beautiful ocean view Hotel right off Ocean Dr. This Hotel caters to many tourists in one of Miami's most popular spots.
